attributes.action: Give an ID card to the EEA citizens who are living and working in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Documents that can be used to Control amd make easier life of EEA citizens in UK
attributes.background: Create and provide a biometric card for EEA Citizens

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
          
You might like to sign this petition instead, which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315622.

Alternatively, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what such an ID card would be used for and how it would benefit EEA citizens living in the UK.
